trends: There have been no other sightings in Pea Ridge
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Perfectly round ball. No sound or trail of sparks. Angle to ground about 65-70 degrees. Straight line flight path. Very sharp angle. No impact sound or flash. Constant speed.
divs: sighting detailsmuch brighter\larger than a plane. only one color light.(orange\yellow). no sound at all. smoking a cig outside and it came down due east of my location. flight path was like a meteor but without any tail, sparks or change in brightness. soft glow on outer edge (small). glow area width estimated at +\- 20% of central object���s diameter. same color but softer. clear skies, no clouds. because the actual distance would be almost impossible to tell from a single observation point, it could have been much further away and larger than it appeared to be. object did not pull up and appeared to impact but was obscured by a house prior to impact. absolutely straight flight path at a very sharp angle. no plane could have pulled out of dive at that angle and speed. estimated speed +\- 8k to 10k mph.
